name: Gavoyra
description:
Gavoyra is a 2D action-adventure platformer game.

UPDATES

Version 0.001 20.03.2019

BUGS & FEEDBACK

Gavoyra is currently in development. Feel free to post any bugs, new ideas, or other feedback in the comments section or on Facebook and Vkontakte.

INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS

To install the game just follow these simple steps:

  1. Download the zip file
  2. Unzip the file
  3. Launch "nw"
  4. Launch "dxwebsetup" if needed

Hope you enjoy it!
